reviewtext: These are the best trackballs around.They are better than the later models since the optical sphere rides on bearings sothe pointer traction is super smooth.T-CH11, T-BB13, T-CL13 all have the same ball bearings.These are the 3 supporting ball bearings for the big red (with black dots) optical sphereI found that the size of each of the three bearings is 1.7 mm.Replacement bearings can be found online at bocabearings dot com.
summary: T-CH11, T-BB13, T-CL13 all have the same ball bearings 1.7 mm
